text: Muhminkale! Ninkal nirakaripporaip ponru akivitatirkal;. Pumiyil pirayanam ceyyumpoto allatu poril itupatto (maranamatainta) tam cakotararkalaip parri (annirakarippor) kurukinranar; "avarkal nam'mutane iruntiruntal maranam atainto, kollappatto poyirukkamattarkal" enru, anal allah avarkal manatil ekkamum kavalaiyum untavatarkakave ivvaru ceykiran;. Melum, allahve uyirppikkiran;. Avane marikkac ceykiran;. Innum allah ninkal ceypavai anaittaiyum parppavanakave irukkinran
